channel.title: Posts on kalmai
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on kalmai

item.title: Man Shouting at Clouds
item.description: I too made a new years resolution, spin up a production server for my side project. My journey into free/freemium cloud hosting had multiple stops with mixed results.

item.title: Down the Clicky Rabbit Hole
item.description: Pretty early on in life I found myself chronically on the web. On my right, my mouse, my left, my keyboard, and the world at my fingertips.

item.title: Another Portfolio Refresh
item.description: A portfolio site is a must as a developer. As we grow as engineers, our portfolios must adjust as well. Tempting as it may be to hop on the new Javascript framework for your refresh, maybe it is best to just keep it simple stupid.

item.title: Grokking Rails
item.description: Notify myself and other users who sign up when they can act upon free non-gambling related game-day promotions.
